document.full_text: at least three policemen and three suspected islamist militants were killed in clashes in russia's north caucasus on monday, media reported, underlining the kremlin's struggle to contain violence there.
document.title: at least 6 killed in clashes in russia's north caucasus
lines_and_colors: at least three policemen and three suspected islamist militants were killed in clashes in russia's north caucasus on monday, media reported, underlining the kremlin's struggle to contain violence there.
